name: Earthquake (Yabra)
description:
ATTENTION!!! During the game, an epileptic seizure is possible!!!

There was an earthquake in this game.

You need to get out of the canyon where you fell. Jump over the stones that have already fallen and get out! But be careful ... If a stone falls on you or if you run into it it will be very painful !!! True, there are pluses in the falling stones too ... Saddle the stone and jump on! And remember: the main thing is to survive and get out !!!

Control:

   Arrows left and right - control the hero

   Space - jump

   Left Ctrl - High Jump

   Q - exit the game

Writed on C++ with SFML multimedia library(keyboard)
